main.name: Caroline Twyman
main.description: Creative Problem-Solver experienced in building Supply-Chain solutions.
main.bio: Coming from the fast-paced logistics industry, I am able to implement and communicate creative solutions to important problems. I am a team player experienced in multiple tech stacks and adaptable to new technologies.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I learned the MERN stack of web development.
I was interested in all things related to the human condition, from studying the brain to painting oil portraits

work.title: Solutions Consultant
work.description: Design and build supply chain, transportation management, and accounting solutions using AWS, Azure, EDI, XML, FTP, AS2. Key in migrating processes to React Framework Enterprise Management platform.

work.title: EDI Developer
work.description: Developed EDI conenctions between carriers, companies, warehouses, and accounting parties

testimonials.text: Caroline's so good at coding, it's nothing but Web.
Caroline's name rhymes with my name'
